internal.content:
--- title: Functional Areas --- ### These are the functional areas detail.
Functional Area Detail
Attached Docs 
Fully Supported.
File System
   If using the file system mount, the same file system mount can be configured in MAS through volume mount in OpenShift. 
   No change is needed for the Manage declines configuration, if the mount point is same as before.
Object Storage(S3)
   No change needed to bring attached documents.
   Object storage server public certificate may need to be imported.
Reporting 
BIRT supported.
Cognos will not be part of the entitlement nor supported in the initial release (8.0).
Industry Solutions/ Add-ons 
All Industry Solutions/Add-ons will be supported.
Anywhere 
Updated Mobile Apps will be available for download.
Maximo Mobile 
All connected and disconnected functions in one application. Initial version delivers Assist, followed by Technician and Inspections.
Scheduler, Calibration, Linear 
Fully supported and now part of Manage. Life Sciences is covered via Calibration.
Migration Manager 
Fully supported.
All pending migration packages should be migrated prior to upgrade (prerequisite).
Configuration options will be provided during deployment for persistent volume mount for file-based packages. 
Automation APIs will be available. Supports the automation pf package creation and deployment.
Multi Languages 
All languages(25) will be supported.
SAP/Oracle Integration 
Fully Supported.
Third Party Add-On 
Existing 3rd party changes will be moved over only if the changes can be extracted completely in the customization archive.
Maximo Archiving 
Not supported in 8.0.

--- title: Functional Areas --- ### These are the functional areas detail.
Functional Area Detail
Attached Docs 
Fully Supported.
File System
   If using the file system mount, the same file system mount can be configured in MAS through volume mount in OpenShift. 
   No change is needed for the Manage declines configuration, if the mount point is same as before.
Object Storage(S3)
   No change needed to bring attached documents.
   Object storage server public certificate may need to be imported.
Reporting 
BIRT supported.
Cognos will not be part of the entitlement nor supported in the initial release (8.0).
Industry Solutions/ Add-ons 
All Industry Solutions/Add-ons will be supported.
Anywhere 
Updated Mobile Apps will be available for download.
Maximo Mobile 
All connected and disconnected functions in one application. Initial version delivers Assist, followed by Technician and Inspections.
Scheduler, Calibration, Linear 
Fully supported and now part of Manage. Life Sciences is covered via Calibration.
Migration Manager 
Fully supported.
All pending migration packages should be migrated prior to upgrade (prerequisite).
Configuration options will be provided during deployment for persistent volume mount for file-based packages. 
Automation APIs will be available. Supports the automation pf package creation and deployment.
Multi Languages 
All languages(25) will be supported.
SAP/Oracle Integration 
Fully Supported.
Third Party Add-On 
Existing 3rd party changes will be moved over only if the changes can be extracted completely in the customization archive.
Maximo Archiving 
Not supported in 8.0.
